thread.title: New autopsy confirms Balamurugan died from beatings - lawyers
thread.title_full: New autopsy confirms Balamurugan died from beatings - lawyers

title: New autopsy confirms Balamurugan died from beatings - lawyers
text:
The second post mortem on custodial death victim S Balamurugan has confirmed he had suffered multiple beatings while in police custody, said lawyers of the deceased's family. 
"The findings of the second autopsy has confirmed the fears of the family of the late Balamurugan." 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
